summary: A retexture and shaping of the mannequins in fine wood
descriptionHtml:
Name: Clintsters Buff Wood Male Mannequins 
Version: 1.0
Category: Textures
Author: Clintster74
===============================================
I was so glad to see mannequins in Skyrim after have spent hours making them for some of my FNV mods. I was so disappointed to see that they were made of weathered drift wood, and made out of more than one piece of wood, they look like a bad patch worked quilt.
So I hired a wood carver to make me some new buff mannequins finely carved out of one piece wood and then soaked in hot beeâ€™s wax to preserve the wood and give it a little shine.
I now give them to you.
=================================================
Description:
A retexture and shaping of the mannequins in fine wood
===============================================
Installation:
Unpack the zip file to folder of your choice, copy the meshes and texture folder to your Skyrim data folder and allow for overwrite.
================================================
Uninstall:
Delete the manekin folder from your meshes and texture folders.
================================================
Thanks to:
Bond123 for testing and input
Bethesda for the game
Nexus and the staff for providing the best place to post and down load mods
=================================================
Tools used:
Photosopt CS5
Nifscope
================================================
Legal and licensing:
My textures are free to use in your mods without farther permission.
You may not up load my textures to other sits!!!
You must credit me for my work!!!
author: Clintster74
